event.title: estimated the city's population to be 251,893 as of July 1, 2014

data.event: The U.S. Census Bureau estimated the city's population to be 251,893 as of July 1, 2014.

event.title: includes Durham as a part of the Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill Combined Statistical Area, which has a population of 2,037,430 as of U.S. Census 2014

data.event: The US Office of Management and Budget also includes Durham as a part of the Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill Combined Statistical Area, which has a population of 2,037,430 as of U.S. Census 2014 Population Estimates.
